Reviews.Title: Perfect Cellphone
Reviews.Author: Brian Cheek
Reviews.Content: This has been a wonderful phone. Metro PCS has very few quality phones. However, this is definitely one of the best. The phone comes with an touch screen and fold out keyboard. Perfect for you cell phone needs. For those of us who aren't ready to go to the droid or iphone. The LG Banter is a wonder compromise that maintains cool features while still being very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Used and abused banter
Reviews.Author: ozzy101
Reviews.Content: LG banter was poorly packaged and obviously used. It also arrived without a manual. The phone now serves as an ugly paper weight as the touch screen no longer works. 90 dollars for two weeks worth of phone use; never again!

Reviews.Title: Can buy this item from metro pcs website for $59
Reviews.Author: amanda
Reviews.Content: Can buy this item from metro pcs website for $59. Current price as of tonight. Can be reviewed at their web address if any questions
